index.title: Image Corrupter Tool
description: With this app, you can glitch your own images by dragging an image into the browser window. You can use the sliders in the control panel to alter the glitched parameters. The image updates in real time.
This app corrupts some bytes in an image. Because of the way [JPEG encoding](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JPEG) works, the corrupted file still shows a corrupted image.

firstvisit: Welcome! Looks like this is your first time here.
To get started, you can drag the sliders below and glitch an image.
You can also import an image from your device. Just click on the OPEN button in the menu.
